website_summaries.verdict: This mattress pad is your best bet if you're seeking a budget-friendly, basic mattress pad.
pros: A must-have for anyone who suffers from allergies thanks to its hypoallergenic material at an affordable price
cons: This is a basic, no-frills mattress pad that sufficiently covers the mattress but doesn't provide much extra support

customer_reviews.title: I've tried rotating the mattress pad but then the lump goes under our backs which is even worse. I've tried flipping it over and trying to ...
customer_reviews.text: It could have been the way they packaged the product, none the less, there is a huge lump that goes through the middle so it does not lay flat. It's been 3 months now and I'm getting ready to toss it. Both sides of the bed are on a downward slope with the highest point in the middle of the bed. I've tried rotating the mattress pad but then the lump goes under our backs which is even worse. I've tried flipping it over and trying to massage it out but it is in there for good. If you're purchasing the product in store you may not have this issue but I would not recommend ordering it online.
customer_reviews.author: Christie Cutler

customer_reviews.title: $20 down the toilet. Inaccurate advertising printed directly on product package.
customer_reviews.text: I honestly should have read the reviews before purchasing-- you can bet I won't be making that mistake again. But here's my review as well! I didn't even get to use it. As you can see from the picture, the product clearly advertises that you can "Machine Wash and Dry", so I did just that. I put it through the washer and drier. And by the time it came out of the latter, it had melted and gotten the plasticy residue all over my other clothes as well.
customer_reviews.author: Diedrich Zentler

customer_reviews.title: Not a good choice
customer_reviews.text: The worst mattress cover I’ve ever used. I took it off the bed and threw it away. It made the biggest mess on my mattress. It pilled up and covered my mattress with debris. It would not stay in place. Stayed bunched up under the area I sleep
customer_reviews.author: Tim P.

customer_reviews.title: Good mattress pad.
customer_reviews.text: We recently purchased this pad along with a new 4 inch foam topper. The mattress pad covers the new topper and mattress very well, seems well made and is comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: slowbutshure

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Protection
customer_reviews.text: I bought this mattress pad cover to protect the expensive memory foam topper my wife and I purchased. This product has very deep pockets, we have a standard king mattress and a 5 inch firm foam topper, and this mattress pad fits over them both. As far as protection, you couldn't ask for more. We currently live in a small space, so it is not uncommon for us to eat dinner while sitting on the edge of the bed. This mattress pad has taken chicken grease, soda, wine, and hot sauce (to name a few, lol), and none of these substances has seeped through to the foam topper.
customer_reviews.author: David FazzariTop Contributor: Archery

customer_reviews.title: Not the best quality
customer_reviews.text: I've had this pad for a while. As soon as I put it on my bed, I noticed that while the pad was good, the sides that stretch over the mattress was very flimsy. It would tear easily and and it doesn't stay very well ... always needing to adjust it. With that said, I need to purchase a new mattress pad and I will not purchase this nor would I recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: D. Pugh

customer_reviews.title: I am simply looking to have this cover as a ...
customer_reviews.text: I am simply looking to have this cover as a general buffer between me and my mattress to help keep the mattress stain-free and to avoid sleeping a fitted-sheet-removed from the mattress material. The top fabric is not the softest but definitely softer than your typical mattress material. My principal complaint is that it does not have 18 inch sides as listed in the product description. It barely fits my 14 inch mattress. It will definitely be returned if it starts to slide off after I sleep on it.
customer_reviews.author: EC

customer_reviews.title: THE GRAND - Fitted Quilted Mattress Pad
customer_reviews.text: THE GRAND - Fitted Quilted Mattress Pad is very nice and comfortable. It fits my bed which is 15 inches with no problem. It does not come off what so ever. I will purchase again for the other king bed in the other room. Shipping was fast. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: DFL

customer_reviews.title: Ruined after a couple washes
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace something similar that I had previously, hoping to have something slightly better and gave it a try. It turned out to be substantially worse. As you can in the photos after just a couple of washes the material is coming loose at the seam and there are little lint balls all over. It's itchy, with practically no cushion left to feel. For the price I think you can do better elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Lives up to it's Grand Name
customer_reviews.text: I was very pleased with the speed of the delivery on this item. For the price, the quality was very good. It had a pretty strong chemical smell, so I washed it right away. Once it was washed it was fine. It fit the king sized bed really well, and I didn't have to fight it to get it on the corners. I plan on buying another for a guest bed.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonAnn

customer_reviews.title: Perfect mattress for my camper
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this mattress because the other one I had in my camper would leave me with a sore back when I woke up. This one is extremely comfortable and I can sleep on my back or sides with no problems at all! It was well worth replacing my other mattress (it was fairly new) because now I get a great nights sleep in my camper. It also fits perfectly well without obstructing my closet doors when I need to open or close them. Finally after years of searching I found one that's perfect!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jean's ponies

customer_reviews.title: I am very pleased with the quality and comfort of this product
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with the quality and comfort of this product. I am terminally ill with ALS and comfort in my bed is imperative, this pad is better than the other, more expensive ones I have tried. I HIGHLY RECOMMEND it!
customer_reviews.author: D. Lichtenstein

customer_reviews.title: GARBAGE
customer_reviews.text: The first couple days of use was no problem, but after a week or so the material of the product gets fuzz balls all over even without washing.
customer_reviews.author: blue home LLC

customer_reviews.title: Great quality product! Fit perfectly!
customer_reviews.text: I read a lot of reviews for this product before buying and decided to give it a try. I found it to be a great quality product at a great price! I even ordered a second one after receiving this one. I put them on a 12 and 14 inch foam mattress. The fit was great, but I'm not sure that it would fit an 18 inch as advertised. There are no odors and it is definitely not paper thin as some reviews indicated. It was exactly what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Mimi in VA

customer_reviews.title: YOU GET WHAT YOU PAY FOR
customer_reviews.text: This mattress cover looked nice and fit my deep bed very well, however, like most fabric or material these days, it looks just terrible (thank goodness no one sees this but me) with all the pilling and little balls that appear wherever anyone might move around on the sheet above the surface of this cover. When one tries to pull off the little pilling balls, some sort of weird fibers pull off also. I don't recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: A. Halter

customer_reviews.title: pills
customer_reviews.text: The pad actually "pilled" leaving little mounds of threading all over my black mattress. It is only pilling in the areas that I sleep. Having trouble getting the pillings off my mattress. Also seems to have stretched out and this is from wear from only August. Surprised this didn't last longer and the pillings which I have never had from another mattress cover.
customer_reviews.author: firesign

customer_reviews.title: A perfect fit...........
customer_reviews.text: Quick delivery, great packaging. It was easy to put the mattress pad on my king size bed it was a perfect fit. It is nice and soft, very comfortable to sleep on. Order you won't be disappointed. M.H. Prompt delivery, great packaging. Easy to put on my king size bed, very soft material. Easy to sleep on no discomfort. I would recommend you ordering!!!!!!! M.H.
customer_reviews.author: M.H.

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: My daughter lives in a group home and space is limited so, I had purchased her a three-quarter bed. It's smaller than a full but, larger than a twin. I always had to buy full sheets and bedding because, I could never find anything else to fit. The full was always a little bit too big. I was so glad when I found this product and it fits her mattress perfectly. Yay!!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Tag says do NOT wash in HOT water and do NOT put in Dryer
customer_reviews.text: Good price and nice looking mattress pad. I bought it for my guest room and just went to wash it for the first time. I was very disappointed to read the product tag that says that it had to be washed in cold water and never put in the dryer! That is not acceptable for sanitary reasons. Very disappointed and I would not recommend buying this mattress pad.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle in Philadelphia suburbs

customer_reviews.title: Would not buy again!
customer_reviews.text: Not as stated in description! No padding at all....basically no more mattress protection than an added set of sheets would be. I'm not happy with this purchase...Don't expect much if you order this one. Edited to say, I sent it back. There is NOTHING about this mattress cover that is cushion like. it has almost NO FILLING at all. Description says "CUSHIONY FILLING – Our Grand Basic Cover Will Make Your Mattress Comfortable To Lay On and Will Add Comfort To Your Bed. It Holds Up Well. It Is Not Waterproof
customer_reviews.author: John Bennett, Jr.

customer_reviews.title: CHEAP Extremely disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: Would haven given it 0 stars. Very cheap and thin, not worth the money , even in sale . I thought I would be getting a thicker pad as the original cost was $80.00. Extremely disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: beauti4ash

customer_reviews.title: Mixed reaction
customer_reviews.text: Less of a premium in price for this less well known Three Quarter Size 48"X75" pad than some other sources, which are not that numerous for this size. But after using since May, 2019 I just noticed where the skirt is coming unstiched from the top for about 5" along one of the short sides. I had just washed it again and put it back on but will be taking it off to repair. It is softer and thicker than I expected. I think some that referred to it as thin where comparing to a topper rather than a protective mattress pad.
customer_reviews.author: Jane B.

customer_reviews.title: Good mattress pad cover of the price
customer_reviews.text: At first I was heistant to purchase but the price was just right to convince me to give it a try and I am so glad I did. Its a decent mattress pad cover for the price and it has converted a firm mattress into a comfortable one without making it mushy. I have been using this for several weeks now. If you couple the purchase of this mattress pad cover with an Egyptian cotton bed sheet set, I believe you will be sleeping better longer on a firm mattress, like I am! I am an average sized guy so I can't say if someone who weighed more would feel the same way.
customer_reviews.author: bongo

customer_reviews.title: Great price, fit my 18" mattress
customer_reviews.text: Best price on the internet. I was at Target about to purchase king sized mattress pads and they were $50 each on sale. Of course I checked my app while I'm still in the store and noticed several far below that price on amazon. I settled on this one and glad I did. It's got a good weight to it and fit my deep pocket mattress of 18" with no problem.
customer_reviews.author: WamQQk

customer_reviews.title: Cushy, Comfy, and Custom-Fit !!!  : )
customer_reviews.text: What a great price for a wonderful product ! It’s quality exceeds expectations. We have a thicker mattress, and this is deep enough to stretch over the corners without having to pull and potentially tear the cover. I want to purchase a spare for down the road when it wears out. Thanks for making this available ! : )
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Deep pockets fit Nicely
customer_reviews.text: I bought this mattress cover to replace one that ripped. This queen cover has deep pockets and it fit better without pulling off from the corners like the old cover was doing. It fits nicely, price was good, and I would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: luv2shop

customer_reviews.title: The Grand Mattress Pad is Not "Grand"
customer_reviews.text: It's a $20 mattress pad; don't expect too much from it. If you've had a good mattress pad before, you won't like this one. It's thin, poorly crafted and cheaply made. The fill inside is a cheap, rough, material. It makes a good dog bed cover, although overpriced for even that.
customer_reviews.author: ASD

customer_reviews.title: Nope
customer_reviews.text: no where was it advertised that you cannot put it in the dryer. How many people have the room - or the inclination - to line dry a queen sized mattress cover; Bad news is when you put it in the dryer it melts.
customer_reviews.author: P. A. Creed

customer_reviews.title: Mattress cover pills up inside a week
customer_reviews.text: Fits really well. Easy to put on the bed. But, whatever that outer fabric is must be made from sawdust because within one week there were very uncomfortable "pills" all over the surface -- so large and uncomfortable that I had to take the clippers to it. You can SEE them through the sheet! And you can REALLY feel them! I've used both sides and both pill up badly and quickly. I've since thrown it out and replaced it with a less expensive and better mattress pad.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Tissot

customer_reviews.title: A quality product
customer_reviews.text: Great style, fit, and price. I have had this mattress cover for three years and it still looks new after numerous bouts of laundering. When it needs replacing, I hope to be able to find one just like it!
customer_reviews.author: BornSnowbird

customer_reviews.title: Very very bad, don't buy it
customer_reviews.text: The quality is synthetic and it feels so hot when you lay on it. My back was even itching all the time. We threw it away after we gave it a try. Such a pity I couldn't return it on time. Just a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Nice deep pockets.
customer_reviews.text: It fits well, has nice deep pockets. Fits well, nice deep pockets. I washed it before use and it washed up fine. I would rate it a five, but haven't had it long enough to see how it wears. i washed
customer_reviews.author: Quirky Lady

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: I've only had this product for a couple weeks, but so far it's working well. My last mattress cover was constantly slipping at the corners, and we would awake to our sheets all bunched up. So far, this cover has stayed in place and allows us to sleep without feeling all tangled in the sheets by morning. It's been a good product at a good price for us so far. I would recommend you give it a try.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: VERY SATISFIED!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this item and was surprised how fast it arrived. In excellent condition and exactly as depicted. I don't understand all the bad reviews. It fit beautifully and has been washed three times and still looks and feels like it did the first day. I think it was a terrific price, described exactly what the product was and kept true to that. It shipped the same day and arrived the next day. During that time, I received three emails from the seller. 1) Shipped 2) In transit 3) Arrived OK? How can you ask for more than that? I am very satisfied all around with this product and the service I received. Wish more sellers were so contentious.
customer_reviews.author: S. Poston

customer_reviews.title: Very poor quality..not "GRAND"
customer_reviews.text: I ordered three "grand" mattress covers. After opening one of the promptly delivered mattress covers, I found a four inch "shredded" rip on one of the side wrap around sides as well as a three inch skip in the stitching where the quilted top met the side panels resulting in a hole .I have not had a chance to open the other two . This is certainly not "GRAND" !
customer_reviews.author: Margaret Gaibiselis

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT
customer_reviews.text: I have used the pad for a week now. It fits beautifully--something I have not found before. It's cool, comfortable and seems to work very well for me. So glad I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: Elaine Briscoe

customer_reviews.title: GOOD BUY
customer_reviews.text: Quality excellent. Fits my nine-inch deep Queen mattress not perfectly, a little big, better than too small, and good enough. Well made. Quilted padding as thick as what you find in the b&m stores for the same price. Washes nicely. I don't use a clothes dryer, hang out. It comes off the line good as new. But then it still is relatively new. I like the convenience of buying off Amazon even though I might find a similar product for the same price in a store. I hate shopping, driving around from store to store, so Amazon is the place for me. I consider this another good buy off Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: Pad unravels on first time wash
customer_reviews.text: This is VERY cheaply made, I washed it upon receiving it and when I took it out of the washer the threads in the quilting pattern were coming unsewed. Will be returning it.
customer_reviews.author: TexasT23

customer_reviews.title: Double purpose at my house.
customer_reviews.text: I've bought deep pocket queen covers and sheets before that were stated to be 16 inches which almost covered my bed, I have a thick tempur pedic bed around 16 inches with a thin box springs together they are around 20 inches and my cat loves to scratch her claws on the corner of the bed in the morning. This cover not only covers my mattress from spills but also helps keep the cat claws off the expensive mattress! Yeah it had a little smell to it the first 24 hours, I washed it and line dried it, wasn't overwhelming.
customer_reviews.author: Non Paid Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: I purchased this because it was listed as an Amazon ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this because it was listed as an Amazon choice. After using it for a few months I will say that it isn't really my choice. It is constantly "shedding" and I continually find little pieces of fuzz on my bedding.
customer_reviews.author: Lindie Lou

customer_reviews.title: The mattress cover is exactly as described-excellent quality!!
customer_reviews.text: The mattress cover is of the highest quality in material and workmanship, and the price was rightg. We are very pleased with this purchase and recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Josephine B.

customer_reviews.title: Deep pocket mattress cover
customer_reviews.text: This deepnpocket matress Cover is perfect for my memory foam mattress topper. It keeps it in place perfectly! And just so you know, local stores don’t care one, so if any of my friends is looking for one, I know right where to send them!!!
customer_reviews.author: MaryEHall

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Fit!
customer_reviews.text: Finally a mattress pad that stays in place! It’s comfortable, easy to put on and stays put. I have a deep mattress and this fits perfectly. Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: marty oliver

customer_reviews.title: Does not bunch up on thinner matresses
customer_reviews.text: It's a pretty straight forward product. My biggest concern was that my new mattress is only about 10 - 12" thick and I was worried this would bunch up b/c it can fit over a much thicker mattress. It does NOT do bunch up on the mattress top; it stays nice and flat.
customer_reviews.author: G.I. Joe Chicago

customer_reviews.title: Good value for the dollars spent
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this mattress pad cover to cover a recently purchased 2" memory foam pad. This Mattress Pad Cover is well made and the 18" fitted skirt with elastic binding is considered a real plus when placing both items over our recently purchased 14" Sealy mattress. Good value for the dollars spent.
customer_reviews.author: Leonard

customer_reviews.title: Great fit
customer_reviews.text: Just what we needed for a oversized mattress in a spare bedroom, fits great and don't have to stretch it like others to fit, haven't used much so unsure of durability or ease of cleaning but I bet it is as good as any of the others and the price is great.
customer_reviews.author: garym

customer_reviews.title: Comfort at a great price
customer_reviews.text: Came just as expected, the company even contacted us in advance to let us know how to "air it out". This was helpful, and it "inflated" very quickly, we slept on it within a few hours and had a great night's sleep. We used it on our boat and it's saved us from needing to replace the mattress.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin Havelka

customer_reviews.title: Good cheap mattress pad
customer_reviews.text: Good cheap mattress pad. The packaging says you can machine dry but the tag matches the description of "Machine Wash cold water, hang or lay flat to dry", with several warnings not to expose it to various heat sources, so expect to air dry this.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas H.

customer_reviews.title: I love this mattress cover
customer_reviews.text: I love this mattress cover, It made my bed so soft, It makes it hard to leave in the morning. It doesn't make noise when you move around. But at the same time it repels liquid nicely. To protect your mattress. Sometimes I spill soda on my bed so I wanted something to protect my mattress. THIS IS PERFECT. I also have no problem putting my sheets on my bed with this. It's not too poofy, it's just right.
customer_reviews.author: GreenCowLand

customer_reviews.title: THE GRAND - Mattress Pad Cover - Fitted - Quilted - Twin (39x75") - Stretches to 16" Deep!
customer_reviews.text: Finally found a mattress pad cover that fits a twin mattress nicely. Tried quite a few until I found this one. Soft to the touch made of good quality thread count. Deep enough to fit a standard new mattress. Fits comfortable, easy to put on. Not too tight, so you don't have to fight at those corners like I've had to do in the past. These are the ideal Mattress Pad covers that covers everything you would want from a mattress cover. Would recommend these to others.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Mattress Cover
customer_reviews.text: This is the only mattress cover I've ever purchased that actually, perfectly, fit my full size mattress! It adds a layer of softness without being overdone and is finely constructed. Loving it so fat!
customer_reviews.author: Mango Sunrise

customer_reviews.title: Great solution to a mediocre mattress.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product before going to visit my grandmother. The beds at her house are so hard, it's almost like sleeping in a cardboard and springs. I put this mattress cover on after the second night and I immediately noticed a difference. It's been one month since I've been using this product on my mattress and it makes a great difference when I lay on the bed. The bed is still hard but I feel like I'm laying down on a firm pillow.
customer_reviews.author: Ericka

customer_reviews.title: No perspiration cover
customer_reviews.text: I got these to help prevent sweating from the top of the mattress man made cover. I found the new cover to help prevent the perspiration.
customer_reviews.author: Boogie

customer_reviews.title: Very Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Great for my wife, she is sleeping great overnight since we put it on the bed. For me, it's still not firm enough but is much better than before. I have lower back pain and before I couldn't get out of bed without taking two hours afterwards to move right. Now I can get up right away with only a little back pain each morning. Otherwise I would have given it a 5 star. Much cheaper than buying a new mattress to get this level of comfort!
customer_reviews.author: Fred Foose

customer_reviews.title: first time
customer_reviews.text: So far its working not sure how long it will hold up. Material is very thin. Waiting to see how it looks after first wash
customer_reviews.author: Polly Smith

customer_reviews.title: I'll buy it again!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great mattress pad. The quilted side is the right size - not too skimpy. The edges are deep enough to comfortably fit around the mattress and stay secure. It washes up nicely and resists pilling.
customer_reviews.author: Judith M. Heher

customer_reviews.title: Good fit for deep fitting
customer_reviews.text: This is a good buy. My son has a pillow top mattress that we then added a 3" memory foam topper to. So....there was like 18" or so to cover. What I like about this cover is that the sides are a stretchy lycra-like material. It may even be lycra, but it stretched out nicely and stays snugly under the corners with just enough elasticity. If you are looking for waterproof, this is not it. But if you want to cover a foam mattress topper it's perfect because sheets stick to those so you want to have something in between. I recommend! Super good price too.
customer_reviews.author: tabowers71

customer_reviews.title: The Perfect Mattress Pad Cover
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect and just what I wanted. We are a family of allergies. Can never find what I want locally. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed for a great night's sleep
customer_reviews.text: When it was time to replace my old mattress pad cover, I first tried the highly rated Sleep TIte (, however, I did not care for that at all because the plastic layer--while almost assuredly effective in repelling most anything from getting into the mattress--seemed to radiate my body heat & the material just wasn't breathable, albeit as designed. What I didn't realize what I'd wanted was a cotton/poly breathable mattress cover & this one is just that. Now my sheets stay in place & I get a great night's rest.
customer_reviews.author: Lance Alligood

customer_reviews.title: Great and comfortable sleep
customer_reviews.text: As described and more. Great and comfortable sleep. Have a memory foam mattress that feels hard as a rock as I am a side sleeper. This topper gives my waist, neck, and back the extra support by forming to my curves rather than forcing me to sleep on a flat surface. I look forward to enjoying this "like a cloud" sleep system for years to come.
customer_reviews.author: R.J. Castille

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: Very cheaply made. A corner ripped the first time i put it on.
customer_reviews.author: brett

customer_reviews.title: The Grand King Mattress Pad Cover Fitted | Deep Pockets Bed Mattress Protection |
customer_reviews.text: ordered this to replace one that was a few years old, good value and price, mattress is 13" thick and fits easy
customer_reviews.author: Flowers Cove

customer_reviews.title: Not bad for the price
customer_reviews.text: This fit our king size bed nicely. But after about two weeks when changing the sheets I noticed that the top is starting to pill. Not sure what it will look like after being washed. As no one but me sees it, not a major issue, but don't think it will last long.
customer_reviews.author: M. Ellis

customer_reviews.title: Can't Dry in Dryer
customer_reviews.text: Can't put it in the dryer! Tag says lay flat to dry. Who buys a mattress pad you can't wash and dry? Aside from that major annoyance, it is deep, seems to be of nice quality and fits a full size with 3" memory foam topper. I guess you get what you pay for but where does one lay a full size mattress pad flat to dry in a small apt? Wish I'd know !
customer_reviews.author: mmcgruf

customer_reviews.title: Mattress cover
customer_reviews.text: We’ve only had this on the guest bed a few days. We have a new mattress on it to. It was slept on one night an seemed to be fine. Good for the price. No problems
customer_reviews.author: DDDebbie

customer_reviews.title: Nice, sturdy mattress pad
customer_reviews.text: I have one of these mattress pads and I bought this one as a not terribly exciting but well received gift. I like it because it’s thick, and it’s easy to put on the bed because the sides are nice and stretchy.
customer_reviews.author: Pamiami

customer_reviews.title: Fits our very Xtra large mattress
customer_reviews.text: Have only laundered this once, so gave it 4 stars as I don't know how well it will hold up, however, it fits our VERY large mattress well and didn't slip off the corners at all the first night. It is a little thin compared to some , we happen to have a extra thick pillow top, so no worries here.
customer_reviews.author: Kiki

customer_reviews.title: Sleeping soundly
customer_reviews.text: After reading some of these reviews I decided to try this mattress cover. I am so glad that I did. From the package, I put these into my dryer ( on low ) after a few spritzes of Fabreeze fabric spray. Then off to put them on the bed...I was very surprised how well it fit my mattress and memory pad Perfect!!! No bunching up around my husbands feet. ( as he has RLS ). I no longer have to lift the bottom of the mattress to make the bed. This cover helps keep the sheets in place. I will be ordering one for our guest room as well. T humbs up!!!
customer_reviews.author: NEK

customer_reviews.title: I was amazed at how much this mattress pad cover stretched easily ...
customer_reviews.text: This mattress pad cover fit over both a mattress and a memory foam topper (3") we put on top of the mattress to help with lower back problems. In the past I would put the mattress pad cover over the memory foam topper only, because the mattress pad cover could not fit over both. I was amazed at how much this mattress pad cover stretched easily to fit over both. This worked out better than expected, because both the mattress and memory foam topper stay together as one and does not move around. Affordable, would buy again!
customer_reviews.author: guitarra

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, fits deep mattresses
customer_reviews.text: I've got a 15" deep queen mattress set. I was having a horrible time locating a pad that would fit it. I found it, finally, in this product. Excellent quality. Elasticized fabric keeps the pad snug on the mattress. High-quality stitching keeps it all together. The soft mattress topper is cool and comfortable. It's a great product and I highly recommend it for deep pocket mattresses.
customer_reviews.author: Chris B.

customer_reviews.title: Very nice product, good price!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice mattress pad for the price! Fit my mattress great. I have a 10 inch memory foam mattress, and a 3 inch gel memory foam topper over that, and the mattress pad fits great.
customer_reviews.author: Keith T.

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and very soft
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter’s dorm room. I was really impressed how good the quality was for the price. The first thing I noticed was how soft it was and how well the pillow top was stitched. It’s not a flat pillow top but had a nice loft/fill to it. It also wasn’t a struggle to put on her mattress which they can be sometimes. I would definitely recommend buying it.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa S Bruneau

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: Does what is intended for a lil snug in my 12 memory foam mattress so far though I'm liking it will update after a few washes
customer_reviews.author: Spoilers21

customer_reviews.title: MATTRESS COVER PAD
customer_reviews.text: I received my purchase earlier than what I expected. I was really pleased with the updated arrival.once I removed the pad from its plastic packaging. I was a little taken aback, because it had an unfamiliar odor. Maybe it was because it was enclosed in the plastic packaging, I do not know. but when I completely removed it and shook it out.The smell seemed to disappear. The pad is really nice. it can cover both my mattress and my box spring if i so desired.So far I do not have anything negative to say about the product. great price, great item so far!!!
customer_reviews.author: Rosa

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased with this mattress cover
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this to replace my old mattress cover. What I enjoy the most is it is very smooth. You don't feel any bumps or lines and it adds just a light cushion over my memory foam mattress. It also adds warmth so I'll have to see if it works in our hot Cali summers. It fits my deep pocket bed perfectly. For now I'm very pleased with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: BJMC

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality stitching leading to filling already coming out before ...
customer_reviews.text: Product is falling apart after one gentle cycle wash in cold water and hanging to dry per label. Poor quality stitching leading to filling already coming out before one single use. Very frustrating.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great pad.
customer_reviews.text: The mattress pad is very nice & comfortable. The price was good also. Thanks for the fast delivery.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Watts

customer_reviews.title: KING SIZE MATTRESS PAD THAT ACTUALLY FITS!
customer_reviews.text: This king size mattress pad has the couple extra inches that make the difference between staying put and rolling or popping off the corners. I have been really frustrated with that problem, so it's really nice that these 18" pockets are working and staying in place. Very happy with this purchase!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kim Reader

customer_reviews.title: Fit
customer_reviews.text: It was just as advertised. Fits well, launders well, and isn’t so think that the sheets still fit.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara

customer_reviews.title: Fits great and made well.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this mattress pad about two months ago. Fits the bed perfectly with its deep pockets. It doesn't slide, fits snugly even after washing and drying. Would purchase this mattress pad cover again. Nice quilting and made well.
customer_reviews.author: cobbie1010

customer_reviews.title: New Mattress Pad
customer_reviews.text: Just received our new mattress pad and it fit our new queen size bed perfectly! It looks to be made well and I think it will do it's job!!!
customer_reviews.author: Susan E. Moore

customer_reviews.title: Well padded
customer_reviews.text: THe mattress cover was a gift for my physically challenged brother and he thinks the quality is good, the padding is thick and it appears to be very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Mattress cover
customer_reviews.text: Most mattresses are not fully covered even under warranty unless a mattress cover has been used. We got these from day one with the new mattresses and they are really doing a great job, easy to remove for washing.
customer_reviews.author: Toni

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy this one!
customer_reviews.text: Loved the top fabric and how it looked, BUT, when we washed it the filling and backing came all apart and we had to throw it away! We washed it on gentle and all by itself!
customer_reviews.author: Lauri

customer_reviews.title: Grand Pad
customer_reviews.text: The mattress pad is very comfortable very soft and stays on very well. I would purchase again
customer_reviews.author: hawk

customer_reviews.title: Not sure when shopping - now extremely satisfied
customer_reviews.text: While I really wasn't sure from the product description whether I would like this pad as much as others I've had that were not this specific construction, I can now say without reservation I made the right choice. It is soft, comfortable and cool. It also provides adequate support; exactly what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Frank Majewski

customer_reviews.title: Awesome mattress cover!  Super soft!
customer_reviews.text: I received this mattress pad cover pretty quick. I actually laid on it without my sheets and it is really soft! I have a good quality mattress, but its a tad too firm for me. This makes it more comfy. The material looks like it would hold up for a very long time. It also fits my king perfectly. For the price, this a good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Maggie

customer_reviews.title: Good not great
customer_reviews.text: Bought this hoping it was going to be softer and more comfortable than the pad I was replacing.....there wasn't much difference. It was easier to put on my bed and it doesn't come off the corners of the mattress like my old pad did but overall this wasn't much of an upgrade than my previous pad I was using for about 5 years.
customer_reviews.author: Kent Smith

customer_reviews.title: Buyers Beware!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this last September, and started to notice lumps, then turned it over and the back was all shriveled up from heat in the washer and dryer. My dryer barely heats up enough to dry most clothes. That is absurd, very poor polyester fabric fill, it should have been lined with cotton.
customer_reviews.author: mWd

customer_reviews.title: Not grand, not deep pocket, not cotton blend feel
customer_reviews.text: Bought this because I needed a Full XL which this is. Description says that is is a cotton blend but feels like all synthetic fabric. Did not fit securely over 6 inch mattress and 3 inch topper combo. This product is just ok.
customer_reviews.author: kd

customer_reviews.title: A restful night's sleep
customer_reviews.text: Fits our 1850 3/4 bed perfectly. Well constructed and provides a great night's sleep.
customer_reviews.author: Just a picker

customer_reviews.title: Mattress pad cover.
customer_reviews.text: I liked everything about it, disliked nothing. So soft and luxurious. This is even better than ones I’ve paid twice as much for.
customer_reviews.author: M. Enright

customer_reviews.title: It's thick enough to make it plush and comfortable. Fits our 9" thick queen mattress perfectly - ...
customer_reviews.text: It's thick enough to make it plush and comfortable. Fits our 9" thick queen mattress perfectly - didn't have to stretch it to fit the corners with the sides creeping up. I use it in the guest room and our guests have always said the bed is really comfortable and they slept well, and that's all I ask. I'd recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Gerald and DonnaTalbert

customer_reviews.title: Slick surface
customer_reviews.text: Liked the price. Got what I paid for. Thin padding, slick quilted surface. Plenty of room for 12 inch mattress. So far the elastic is keeping the pad in place. Sheets slip around on the mattress pad surface. Would choose to spend more next time and choose a mattress pad with thicker quilting and cotton surface. Acceptable quality for the price.
customer_reviews.author: J Welch

customer_reviews.title: King size has almost no fill vs the queen size which was much more comfy
customer_reviews.text: Not sure if the one we got was just defective or what! But it was completely flat! We have ordered this same one before in the queen size and loved it. The queen size had way more fill to it.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: This fits our matters perfectly, super soft and has lasted us for a while now through washing and sleeping on. Comfy under sheets and doesn’t slip or catch!
customer_reviews.author: Courtney W. Baxley

customer_reviews.title: not the best
customer_reviews.text: The top is fine, it's held up mostly. My problem is the stretchy material on the sides. It stretches too much causing the mattress pad to bunch up after one night of use. Very uncomfortable and really nothing you can do about it
customer_reviews.author: Jvinyl

customer_reviews.title: Good value mattress pad
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time, in perfect condition and as advertised. Soft pad that fits well and is adequate for a very deep mattress.
customer_reviews.author: MDL San Diego

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn't call it a mattress "pad"
customer_reviews.text: Very very thin. In fact. Thinner than the one I was replacing which was pretty old. It's alright.
customer_reviews.author: Barbicrone

customer_reviews.title: Extremely Pleased With the Quality for the Price
customer_reviews.text: I'm extremely pleased with the quality for the price. I bought one for me and one for my housemate and it's definitely two thumbs way up. Multiple washes and lots of abuse later and there are no rips, no tears, no sign that either mattress pad is going to come apart which happens way too often. Excellent product, and we very highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Christine P. Rose

product_meta.title: THE GRAND Mattress Pad Cover Fitted, Deep Pockets Bed Protection, Hypoallergenic & Breathable (Queen 60x80)
feature_bullets: QUALITY FABRIC AND CONSTRUCTION: Our Grand Mattress pad is exactly that: grand! Our polyester and cotton blend top offers a smooth, soft feel. This mattress pad is a great choice for people who have allergies.

PERFECT FIT: With its deep pockets and generously sized corners, this mattress pad will offer a perfect fit every time. It will stay securely on the bed, without bunching, and your sheets won’t slip off the corners like most mattress pads. It’s easy to put on and take off. It can fit over toppers, whether they be gel or memory foam, and can even fit extra-large mattresses!

ADDS COMFORT: Add an extra layer of softness to your mattress without adding more bulk. It can help older mattresses feel much more comfortable. The fabric is truly breathable, and won’t make you sweat at night.

PROTECTS WHILE YOU REST: Hypoallergenic, breathable, quilted pattern supports your body while protecting your mattress from stains, dust, dirt and dander. It's also completely noiseless and won't bunch up or make any noise while you sleep.
EASY TO CLEAN: Machine wash and dry. Will not shrink after washing. 100% Satisfaction Guarantee. You have nothing to lose, and a good night’s sleep to gain!

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars5,475 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
